FOUND IN: Harpy Eagle - One of the largest and most powerful eagles, characterized by its massive claws and sharp talons.
Magpie (traditionally known for collecting shiny objects, though not literally thieving)
Orchid - The most diverse group of flowering plants with numerous species exhibiting vibrant colors and intricate patterns.
Impasse - A situation in which further progress is impossible; a deadlock.
TNT (Trinitrotoluene) - An organic compound used as an explosive material.
Echinocactus - A genus of cacti known for their spines and often large size, commonly referred to as barrel cacti.
Horatio Nelson - Renowned British naval officer and victor at the Battle of Trafalgar.
Talon - A sharp, hooked claw on an eagle or other bird used for seizing prey.
